<div id="passwordPrompt">
  <p align="center">
    <img src="wedding_title3.png" style="max-width: 66%; height: auto;" alt="Wedding Title">
  </p>
  <h4 style="margin: 0; line-height: 1.2;">Please enter the password for Alivia & Byeong-Hak's Wedding Photo Gallery:</h4>
  <h4 style="margin: 0; line-height: 1.2;">알리비아와 병학의 웨딩 사진 갤러리 비밀번호를 입력해주세요:</h4>
  
  <div style="display:block; margin:15px;"></div>

  <div style="text-align: center;">
  <form onsubmit="checkPassword(event)" style="display: inline-block;">
    <input type="password" id="password" style="padding: 8px; font-size: 1rem;">
      <div style="display:block; margin:10px;"></div>
    <button type="submit"
        style="
          padding: 10px 16px;
          font-size: 1rem;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: 150px;
          box-sizing: border-box;
          background-color: #34377d;
          color: white;
          border: none;
          border-radius: 4px;
        ">
  Submit (클릭)
</button>
  </form>
  </div>
</div>



<div id="protectedContent" style="display:none;">
  <p align="center">
    <img src="wedding_title3.png" style="max-width: 66%; height: auto;" alt="Wedding Title">
  </p>
  
  <h3 style="margin: 0; line-height: 1.2;">Welcome to Alivia & Byeong-Hak's Wedding Photo Gallery!</h3>
  <h3 style="margin: 0; line-height: 1.2;">알리비아와 병학의 웨딩 사진 갤러리에 오신 것을 환영합니다!</h3>

  <div style="display:block; margin:15px;"></div>

  <p>
    <a href="https://bcdanl.github.io/acbcweddingphoto"
       tabindex="-1"
       id="galleryLink"
       style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.25rem; color: #39274b;">
      Click here! (여기를 클릭하세요!)
    </a>
  </p>
</div>



<script>
function checkPassword(event) {
    event.preventDefault(); // Prevent form reload
    const correctPassword = "acbc25";
    const inputPassword = document.getElementById("password").value;

    if (inputPassword === correctPassword) {
        document.getElementById("protectedContent").style.display = "block";
        document.getElementById("passwordPrompt").style.display = "none";
        // Enable tab focus for protected content now
        document.getElementById("galleryLink").removeAttribute("tabindex");
    } else {
        alert("Incorrect password. Please try again. (비밀번호가 틀렸습니다. 다시 시도해 주세요.)");
    }
}
</script>
